day/sky/heaven
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: There was no cause and effect between the Heaven and Earth Society and the Lin Shuangwen Uprising.
sentences.chinese: 天地会与林爽文起义之间没有直接的因果关系。
新增华仔天地会员活动花絮视频。

sentences.english: As first of the Five Rear Lodges , Green Wood Lodge ranked sixth among the ten Lodges of the Society.
sentences.chinese: 青木堂是后五堂之长，在天地会十堂之中，排列第六。

sentences.english: It is wise to original interpretation for many years of good friend, heaven and earth will ZongDuo ChenJinNa Lord.
sentences.chinese: 原来来人正是智释的多年好友，天地会总舵主陈近南。

sentences.english: A single thought of evil can cause gales, deluges, and tragic disasters.
sentences.chinese: 一念恶，天地会有狂风暴雨发生，造成灾害。
